extDescription.message: Browser extension for tldw_server - your unified AI assistant with RAG, media processing, and more.

learnMoreTldw.message: 了解 tldw 伺服器的運作方式

contextSaveToNotesNoSelection.message: Select text first to save to Notes.

contextSaveToNotesDeliveryFailed.message: Could not open the sidebar to save this note. Check that the tldw Assistant sidebar is allowed on this site and try again.

hfSendPageRejected.message: [tldw] Page send request rejected by tldw_server

hfSendPageErrorWithDetail.message: [tldw] Failed to send this page to tldw_server: $1. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfSendPageError.message: [tldw] Failed to send this page to tldw_server. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfSendPageSuccess.message: [tldw] Sent page to tldw_server for processing

hfSendPageException.message: [tldw] Something went wrong while sending this page to tldw_server. Check that your tldw_server and the extension are running, then try again.

hfPullInProgress.message: [tldw Assistant] A model pull request is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before starting another one.

hfPullConfirm.message: [tldw Assistant] Do you want to send a request to your tldw_server to pull the "$1" model? This is independent of the huggingface.co website. Your server will start pulling the model after you confirm.

hfPullSending.message: [tldw Assistant] Sending a request to your tldw_server to pull "$1". Check the extension icon or your tldw_server logs for progress.

hfPullErrorWithDetail.message: [tldw Assistant] Failed to send a pull request for "$1": $2. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfPullError.message: [tldw Assistant] Failed to send a pull request for "$1". Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfPullSuccess.message: [tldw Assistant] Request sent to your tldw_server to pull "$1". Monitor the extension icon or tldw_server logs for status.

hfPullException.message: [tldw Assistant] Something went wrong while sending a pull request for "$1" to your tldw_server. Check that your tldw_server and the extension are running, then try again.

footerHelp.message: 連線完成後，你可以隨時從擴充功能選單回到這些設定。

authModeHelp.message: Single User（API Key）適合個人或小型團隊的伺服器。Multi User（Login）適用於多人共用的部署，使用者以帳號或 SSO 登入。請選擇符合你 tldw_server 設定方式的模式。

apiKeyHelp.message: 在 tldw_server → Settings → API Keys 中可以找到你的 API 金鑰。在那裡產生金鑰後，將其貼到這裡。

confirmStepAria.message: 步驟 3 / 3 — 連線摘要與後續步驟

notesEmpty_connectDescription.message: 若要使用「筆記」，請先連線到你的 tldw 伺服器。

notesEmpty_connectExample1.message: 開啟「設定」→「tldw server」，新增你的伺服器 URL。

notesEmpty_connectExample2.message: 若伺服器正在執行但無法連線，請使用「診斷」。

notesEmpty_demoTitle.message: 在示範模式中探索筆記

notesEmpty_demoDescription.message: 此示範會說明「筆記」如何整理你的洞見。之後你可以連線自己的伺服器，建立並儲存真正的筆記。

notesEmpty_demoExample1.message: 看看在清單中，筆記標題、預覽與時間戳記是如何顯示的。

notesEmpty_demoExample2.message: 完成連線後，你可以從會議、複閱結果等內容建立筆記。

notesEmpty_demoExample3.message: 將「筆記」搭配「媒體」與「複閱」一起使用，幫助你整理並追蹤重要的發現。

notesEmpty_demoSample1Title.message: 示範筆記：每週會議摘要

notesEmpty_demoSample1Preview.message: 最近團隊同步中的決策、阻礙與後續追蹤事項。

notesEmpty_demoSample2Preview.message: 從長篇文章或論文中整理出的關鍵洞見。

notesEmpty_demoSample3Preview.message: 客戶通話的重點整理，以及下一步行動與負責人。

notesEmpty_description.message: 建立並整理與 tldw 洞見相關的自由格式筆記。

notesEmpty_exampleCreate.message: 為最近的一場會議或逐字稿建立一則新的筆記。

notesEmpty_exampleLink.message: 將複閱產出儲存到「筆記」，方便日後回顧。

restartOnboardingLabel.message: 從頭重新開始引導設定

restartOnboardingConfirmMessage.message: 這會重設你的引導狀態，並將你帶回設定流程的起始步驟。

enableOcrAssets_label.message: 啟用 OCR（首次使用時下載約 5MB）

enableOcrAssets_downloadNotice.message: 啟用 OCR 後，首次使用時將下載約 5MB 的語言資料。

enableOcrAssets_assetsEnabled.message: OCR 資源已啟用並可使用

omniSearchPlaceholder.message: 搜尋頁面、聊天、媒體、筆記…

connectionCard_connectedCaption.message: 現在可以在選項頁和側邊欄中使用聊天和工具。

quickIngestQueuedAria.message: {{label}} — 已排隊 {{count}} 個項目 — 按一下以檢視並處理

connectionCard_descriptionConnectedList_.description: First bullet in the connected-state server connection card, highlighting media review.
Second bullet in the connected-state server connection card, highlighting knowledge/notes search.

connectionCard_descriptionConnectedList_.message: 在自己的文件上使用 RAG
connectionCard_descriptionConnectedList_.description: Third bullet in the connected-state server connection card, highlighting retrieval-augmented generation usage.

folders.description: Generic label for folders in the UI.

folderView.description: View mode label for showing items grouped by folder.

dateView.description: View mode label for showing items grouped by date.

newFolder.description: Button label for creating a new folder.

folderName.description: Form label for a folder name input.

noFolders.description: Empty-state message shown when there are no folders.

expandAll.description: Action label to expand all nodes in a tree view.

collapseAll.description: Action label to collapse all nodes in a tree view.

untitled.description: Fallback label used when an item has no title.

moveToFolder.description: Action label to move an item to a folder.

quickIngest_ocrHelp.message: OCR 可協助從掃描的 PDF 或圖片中擷取文字。

specReloadedToast.message: 進階規格已從伺服器重新載入
specReloadedToast.description: Toast shown after reloading the Quick Ingest advanced schema from the server.

specReloadedToastDiff.message: 進階規格已從伺服器重新載入（新增欄位：{{added}}，移除欄位：{{removed}}）
specReloadedToastDiff.description: Toast shown after reloading the Quick Ingest advanced schema from the server, with counts for fields added and removed.

specFallbackWarning.message: 使用內建 media.add 綱要備用版本（v{{version}}）；若欄位似乎過時，請對照您的 tldw_server /openapi.json 進行驗證。
specFallbackWarning.description: Warning shown when the Quick Ingest advanced schema falls back to the bundled schema; contains the bundled schema version.

serverOffline.message: 伺服器離線或尚未設定

serverChatLoadError.message: 無法載入伺服器聊天。請檢查連線後再試一次。

serverChatsUnavailableNotConnected.message: 連線到 tldw 伺服器後即可使用伺服器聊天。

serverChatsUnavailableServerError.message: 目前無法使用伺服器聊天。請檢查伺服器記錄或稍後再試。

tools_fs_list.description: Label for the fs.list tool (list directory).

tools_fs_read.description: Label for the fs.read tool (read file).

tools_fs_write.description: Label for the fs.write tool (write file).

tools_fs_apply_patch.description: Label for the fs.apply_patch tool (apply patch).

tools_fs_mkdir.description: Label for the fs.mkdir tool (create directory).

tools_fs_delete.description: Label for the fs.delete tool (delete file or directory).

tools_search_grep.description: Label for the search.grep tool (search file contents).

tools_search_glob.description: Label for the search.glob tool (find files by pattern).

tools_git_add.description: Label for the git.add tool (stage files).

tools_exec_run.description: Label for the exec.run tool (run command).

serverChatForkedLabel.description: Label shown on chats that were forked from another server chat.

serverChatForkedTooltip.description: Tooltip explaining which original server chat this chat was forked from.

commandPalette_goToChat.description: Command palette action label to navigate to the Chat screen.

commandPalette_goToMedia.description: Command palette action label to navigate to the Media screen.

commandPalette_goToNotes.description: Command palette action label to navigate to the Notes screen.

commandPalette_goToFlashcards.description: Command palette action label to navigate to the Flashcards screen.

commandPalette_goToSettings.description: Command palette action label to navigate to the Settings screen.

commandPalette_goToHealth.message: 前往 健康狀況與診斷
commandPalette_goToHealth.description: Command palette action label to open the Health & diagnostics screen.

commandPalette_newChat.description: Command palette action label to start a new chat.

commandPalette_toggleKnowledgeSearch.description: Command palette toggle label for enabling or disabling knowledge search.

commandPalette_toggleKnowledgeSearchDesc.description: Command palette description text explaining the knowledge search toggle.

commandPalette_toggleWebSearch.description: Command palette toggle label for enabling or disabling web search.

commandPalette_toggleWebDesc.description: Command palette description text explaining the web search toggle.

commandPalette_ingestPage.description: Command palette action label to ingest the current page into knowledge.

commandPalette_ingestDesc.message: 將此頁面儲存到你的知識庫
commandPalette_ingestDesc.description: Command palette description text explaining page ingestion into knowledge.

commandPalette_switchModel.description: Command palette action label to switch the active chat/model.

commandPalette_toggleSidebar.description: Command palette toggle label to show or hide the sidepanel.

commandPalette_toggleSidebarDesc.message: 顯示或隱藏聊天側邊欄
commandPalette_toggleSidebarDesc.description: Command palette description text explaining the sidebar visibility toggle.

commandPalette_placeholder.description: Placeholder text shown in the command palette input.

commandPalette_noResults.description: No-results state text in the command palette when nothing matches the query.

commandPalette_title.description: Title of the command palette UI.

commandPalette_navigate.description: Command palette keyboard hint label for navigation.

commandPalette_select.description: Command palette keyboard hint label for selection.

commandPalette_toOpen.description: Command palette keyboard hint label indicating the shortcut to open an item.

commandPalette_categoryActions.description: Label for the Actions category in the command palette.

commandPalette_categoryNavigation.description: Label for the Navigation category in the command palette.

commandPalette_categorySettings.description: Label for the Settings category in the command palette.

commandPalette_categoryRecent.description: Label for the Recent items category in the command palette.

markdown_couldNotDisplay.message: 訊息內容無法顯示。可能是格式無效所致。

notesSearch_exportCsvSuccess.message: 已將 {{count}} 篇筆記匯出為 CSV（{{size}}）

notesSearch_exportJsonSuccess.message: 已將 {{count}} 篇筆記匯出為 JSON（{{size}}）

modelSelect_tooltip.message: 變更下一則訊息使用的模型

featureHints_knowledge_description.message: 開啟知識搜尋面板，尋找片段並插入到聊天中。

featureHints_moreTools_description.message: 使用視覺模式、圖片上傳、快速匯入和完整應用程式。

featureHints_commandPalette_description.message: 按下 {{shortcut}} 搜尋指令、設定等。

featureHints_modelSettings_description.message: 微調溫度、上下文長度和其他模型設定。

chatSidebar_foldersRequireConnection.message: 資料夾需要伺服器連線

error_friendlyApiKeySummary.message: 無法連線到您的 tldw 伺服器。

error_friendlyApiKeyHint.message: 您的 API 金鑰可能無效。開啟「設定」→「tldw 伺服器」檢查 URL 與 API 金鑰，然後再試一次。

error_friendlyTimeoutHint.message: 伺服器停止串流回應。請重試，或開啟 Health & diagnostics 查看伺服器狀態。

error_friendlyGenericSummary.message: 與您的 tldw 伺服器通訊時發生問題。

error_friendlyGenericHint.message: 請稍後再試，或開啟 Health & diagnostics 檢查伺服器狀態。

contentReview_emptyDescription.message: 目前尚無草稿。使用 Quick Ingest 並啟用「儲存前審查」即可建立草稿。

contentReview_reviewBeforeStorageHint.message: 先處理，然後在提交到伺服器前於本機編輯草稿。

contentReview_reviewWarningTitle.message: 要將草稿儲存在本機嗎？

contentReview_reviewWarningBody.message: 草稿會儲存在此瀏覽器中，可能包含敏感資料。你可隨時在「內容審核」頁面清除草稿。

contentReview_reviewWarningBodySecondary.message: 審核模式會在提交到伺服器前把內容保留在用戶端。

contentReview_selectDraft.message: 選取一個草稿開始審查。

contentReview_resetBody.message: 這會還原此草稿的原始內容。

contentReview_aiHint.message: 會將草稿內容傳送至伺服器，由 AI 進行處理。

contentReview_aiConsentBody.message: 這會將草稿內容傳送到你的 tldw 伺服器進行 AI 處理。在你提交之前，草稿都只會保留在本機。

contentReview_aiUnavailable.message: 聊天補全功能目前無法使用。

contentReview_detectSectionsBody.message: 這會取代既有段落並重設你的選取項目。

contentReview_templates_transcript_clean.message: 在保留行結構的前提下，統一標點符號與大小寫。

contentReview_templates_speaker_turns_de.message: 確保每位說話者的輪次各自位於一行，並帶有清楚的標籤。

contentReview_templates_chapter_headings.message: 插入 Markdown 標題來分組主題，而不移除任何內容。

contentReview_missingSourceBody.message: 請附加原始檔案後再提交此草稿。

contentReview_commitDisabled.message: 提交前請先附加原始的音訊／視訊檔案。

contentReview_discardBody.message: 此草稿會被標記為已捨棄，並從審查清單中移除。

contentReview_commitAllTitle.message: 提交所有已審查的草稿？

contentReview_commitAllBody.message: 只有標記為已審查的草稿會被提交。

contentReview_storageCapWarning.message: 此檔案超過本機草稿上限 ({{cap}})。

contentReview_clearBody.message: 這會移除所有本機內容審查草稿與相關資源。

reviewNavigationFailed.message: 無法開啟內容審閱。請再試一次。

reviewNavigationRetry.message: 重新嘗試開啟內容審閱

quickIngest_subtitle.message: Enter one or more URLs. Force type per row if needed.

quickIngest_offlineTitle.message: 伺服器離線 — 僅限測試環境

quickIngest_offlineDescription.message: 您可以在此排程 URL 與檔案並檢視欄位，但在 tldw 伺服器恢復線上前不會進行匯入，請重新連線以處理待辦項目。

quickIngest_storeRemoteAria.message: 將匯入結果儲存到你的 tldw 伺服器

quickIngest_processOnlyAria.message: 僅在本機處理匯入結果

quickIngest_storeRemoteHelp.message: 上傳到你的 tldw 伺服器以便索引。

quickIngest_processOnlyHelp.message: 只處理並在本機保留結果（下載 JSON）。

quickIngest_storageServerDescription.message: 儲存在你的 tldw 伺服器上（建議用於 RAG 和共用工作區）。

quickIngest_storageLocalDescription.message: 僅保存在此瀏覽器中；不會寫入伺服器。

quickIngest_reviewBeforeStorageHint.message: 先處理，然後在提交到伺服器前於本機編輯草稿。

quickIngest_reviewWarningTitle.message: 要將草稿儲存在本機嗎？

quickIngest_reviewWarningBody.message: 草稿會儲存在此瀏覽器中，可能包含敏感資料。你可隨時在「內容審核」頁面清除草稿。

quickIngest_reviewWarningBodySecondary.message: 審核模式會在提交到伺服器前把內容保留在用戶端。

quickIngest_reviewNavigationFailed.message: 無法開啟內容審閱。請再試一次。

quickIngest_reviewNavigationRetry.message: 重新嘗試開啟內容審閱

quickIngest_audioDiarizationHelp.message: Turn on to separate speakers in transcripts.

quickIngest_advancedEmpty.message: No advanced options detected — try reloading the spec.

quickIngest_errorSummary.message: 目前無法處理這些匯入項目。

quickIngest_errorHint.message: 請先檢查你的 tldw 伺服器，然後再試一次。Health & diagnostics 可以協助排除匯入相關的問題。

quickIngest_checkHealthLink.message: 在 Health & diagnostics 中檢查伺服器健康狀態

quickIngest_healthAriaHint.message: 最近的執行失敗——請從頂端開啟 Health & diagnostics 以查看詳細資訊。

quickIngest_specReloadedToast.message: 進階規格已從伺服器重新載入

quickIngest_specReloadedToastDiff.message: 進階規格已從伺服器重新載入（新增欄位：{{added}}，移除欄位：{{removed}}）
